Pre-Game Insights: Spain manager Luis de la Fuente is set to make an abundance of changes to his starting XI for Monday's Euro 2024 Group B clash with Albania in Dusseldorf.La Roja have already guaranteed their progression to the last 16 of the tournament as group winners.Rodri's suspension means he will serve a one-game ban, while Nacho and Ayoze Perez are also considered for rest.Aymeric Laporte is likely to start a third game in a row, alongside Dani Vivian in defence.David Raya will step in for Unai Simon, while Alejandro Grimaldo and Jesus Navas are set to be deployed in the full-back areas.Martin Zubimendi is in line to step in for Rodri, with Mikel Merino and Alex Baena completing a three-man engine room.Ferran Torres and Mikel Oyarzabal are set to be deployed on the wings.Spain's possible starting lineup includes Raya; Navas, Vivian, Laporte, Grimaldo; Merino, Zubimendi, Baena; Torres, Joselu, Oyarzabal.
